name: Blood Tide
text: In the throes of blood frenzy, you can unleash a whirlwind of claws and teeth against your foes.
prerequisites: Combat Expertise, Greater Blood Frenzy, base attack bonus +6, blood frenzy ability, sahuagin.
benefit:
When you make a full attack while in a blood frenzy, you can give up your regular attacks to instead make one melee attack at your highest base attack bonus against each bleeding or wounded opponent within reach. You must use a natural weapon with these attacks, and you must make a separate attack roll against each opponent. You do not need to use the same natural weapon against each opponent.

When you use Blood Tide, you also forfeit any extra attacks granted by other feats, spells, or abilities.
text_zh: 在血性狂怒的驱使下，你化身为一团爪牙的风暴扑向对手。
prerequisites_zh: 寓守于攻，高等血性狂怒，BAB+6，血性狂怒能力，沙华鱼人。
benefit_zh:
每当你在处于血性狂怒的状态下发动攻击，你都可以放弃你的所有攻击次数而是对目标发动一次单次近战攻击，这次攻击使用你最高的攻击加值并且视为攻击每一个位于你的触及范围内处于流血状态或是已受伤的敌人你必须使用自己的天生武器，并且为每一个目标进行一次攻击检定。你不需要在发动这些攻击时仅使用一种天生武器。

如果你使用血腥如潮，那么你也不能从任何提供额外攻击次数的法术，专长和能力中收益。
